verses.verse: כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> When נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> [was] a child יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> When Israel וָאֹהֲבֵ֑הוּ <S%H157><s%> then I loved וּמִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt קָרָ֥אתִי <S%H7121><s%> him and called לִבְנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> my son

קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> [As] they called לָהֶ֑ם כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> the more הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> them so they went מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from them לַבְּעָלִ֣ים <S%H1168><s%> unto Baalim יְזַבֵּ֔חוּ <S%H2076><s%> they sacrificed וְלַפְּסִלִ֖ים <S%H6456><s%> to graven images יְקַטֵּרֽוּן׃ <S%H6999><s%> and burned incense

וְאָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> is I תִרְגַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H7270><s%> taught לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim קָחָ֖ם <S%H3947><s%> taking עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑יו <S%H2220><s%> them by their arms וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> but they knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רְפָאתִֽים׃ <S%H7495><s%> not that I healed

בְּחַבְלֵ֨י <S%H2256><s%> them with cords אָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> of a man אֶמְשְׁכֵם֙ <S%H4900><s%> I drew בַּעֲבֹת֣וֹת <S%H5688><s%> with bands אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> of love וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֛ם כִּמְרִ֥ימֵי <S%H7311><s%> and I was to them as they that take off עֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> the yoke עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from לְחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3895><s%> on their jaws וְאַ֥ט <S%H328><s%> secret אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to אוֹכִֽיל׃ <S%H398><s%> meat

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> They will not יָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> He shall not return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> but the Assyrian ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מַלְכּ֑וֹ <S%H4428><s%> shall be his king כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> because they refused לָשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> to return

וְחָלָ֥ה <S%H2342><s%> shall abide חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> And the sword בְּעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> on his cities וְכִלְּתָ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> and shall consume בַדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> his branches וְאָכָ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> and devour מִֽמֹּעֲצ֖וֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4156><s%> [them] because of their own counsels

וְעַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> And my people תְלוּאִ֖ים <S%H8511><s%> are bent לִמְשֽׁוּבָתִ֑י <S%H4878><s%> to backsliding וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַל֙ <S%H5920><s%> them to the most High יִקְרָאֻ֔הוּ <S%H7121><s%> from me though they called יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> none at all לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> None יְרוֹמֵם׃ <S%H7311><s%> would exalt

אֵ֞יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> How shall I give thee up אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim אֲמַגֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H4042><s%> deliver יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How אֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> make כְאַדְמָ֔ה <S%H126><s%> Admah אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֖ <S%H7760><s%> appoint כִּצְבֹאיִ֑ם <S%H6636><s%> Zeboiim נֶהְפַּ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> is turned עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> within לִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> care for יַ֖חַד <S%H3162><s%> together נִכְמְר֥וּ <S%H3648><s%> are kindled נִחוּמָֽי׃ <S%H5150><s%> within me my repentings

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> I will not execute חֲר֣וֹן <S%H2740><s%> the fierceness אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> of mine anger לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> I will not return לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> for I [am] God אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אִ֔ישׁ <S%H582><s%> in בְּקִרְבְּךָ֣ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and I will not אָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> of thee and I will not enter בְּעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> into the city

אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> after יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> will walk כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <S%H738><s%> like a lion יִשְׁאָ֑ג <S%H7580><s%> he shall roar כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יִשְׁאַ֔ג <S%H7580><s%> when he shall roar וְיֶחֶרְד֥וּ <S%H2729><s%> shall tremble בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> then the children מִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> from the west

יֶחֶרְד֤וּ <S%H2729><s%> They shall tremble כְצִפּוֹר֙ <S%H6833><s%> as a bird מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וּכְיוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> and as a dove מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> and I will place עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in בָּתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> them in their houses נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

סְבָבֻ֤נִי <S%H5437><s%> compasseth בְכַ֙חַשׁ֙ <S%H3585><s%> me about with lies אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּבְמִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> with deceit בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> but Judah עֹ֥ד <S%H5750><s%> is also רָד֙ <S%H7300><s%> yet ruleth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> with God וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against קְדוֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H6918><s%> with the saints נֶאֱמָֽן׃ <S%H539><s%> and is faithful
